name: rhmmhm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmhm, c4)))

stmt.origin: simprd(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmhm, c4)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))

|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmhm, c4)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmhm, c4))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmhm, c4)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmhm, c4))))

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmhm, c4))), wa(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c2, crg)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmhm, c4))))
-| wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c2, crg)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmhm, c4)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmhm, c4)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c2, crg)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmhm, c4)))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c2, crg)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmhm, c4)))))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cmgp, c1))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cmgp, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[RingHom]c2)↔((c1 ∈ Ring ∧ c2 ∈ Ring)∧(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧ c0 ∈(c3[MndHom]c4))))
⊣ c3 =(mulGrp ` c1)
⊣ c4 =(mulGrp ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmhm, c4)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cmgp, c1))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cmgp, c2))

comment: A ring homomorphism is a homomorphism of multiplicative monoids. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)
